name: manage-my-damn-life
description: Manage My Damn Life is a self-hosted planner and productivity web app built with Next.js. It includes tasks, notes, journal entries, and GTD-style boards, designed to replace fragmented life management tools.
features: Task management: Create, organize, and track tasks with due dates, priorities, and completion status.
Note taking: Capture ideas and information in a structured note system with rich text formatting.
Journal entries: Maintain a personal journal with daily entries, tags, and search functionality.
GTD boards: Implement Getting Things Done methodology with customizable workflow boards.
Calendar view: Visualize tasks and events in daily, weekly, or monthly calendar layouts.
Tag system: Organize content across tasks, notes, and journal entries with flexible tagging.
Search functionality: Find any item quickly using full-text search across all content types.
Mobile responsive: Access and manage your life from any device with a responsive interface.
Data export: Export your tasks, notes, and journal entries for backup or migration.
Privacy first: Self-hosted solution keeps all personal data under your control.
Quick capture: Rapidly add new items with keyboard shortcuts and streamlined input forms.
Progress tracking: Monitor task completion rates and productivity trends over time.
